Low-Calorie VG

EGG WHITE & SALSA BREAKFAST TACOS

Light, fresh, and loaded with 30g protein per serving. These fluffy egg white tacos with fresh salsa are perfect for a quick, low-calorie breakfast.

30g
Protein
280
Calories
20m
Total Time
2
Yield

Nutrition per 2 tacos

Carbs24g
Fat10g
Fiber4g
Sugar4g
Sodium520mg
DifficultyEasy

INGREDIENTS

  • 360ml (12 oz) liquid egg whites
  • 4 small corn or flour tortillas
  • 120g fresh pico de gallo
  • 60g (1/2 cup) shredded pepper jack cheese
  • 1 avocado, sliced
  • Fresh cilantro
  • Hot sauce (optional)
  • Salt and pepper

INSTRUCTIONS

1

Scramble Eggs

Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat. Add egg whites, season with salt and pepper. Scramble until just set, keeping them fluffy.

2

Warm Tortillas

Warm tortillas in a dry skillet or microwave for 20 seconds.

3

Assemble

Divide scrambled egg whites between tortillas. Top with cheese, pico de gallo, avocado slices, and cilantro.

4

Serve

Add hot sauce if desired and serve immediately.
